vocabinfos.mediumDef:
: between
between, among, in the midst of (with other preps), from between
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition: 在... 的中間, 在其中, 在... 之中 (附其他介系詞), 來自... 中間
vocabinfos._zh_Definition: 在... 的中间, 在其中, 在... 之中 (附其他介系词), 来自... 中间

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
: among
between, among, in the midst of (with other preps), from between
A sub-meaning of ben (בַּ֫יִן ": between" H0996)
